name: ADXRE
bio:
Brian Clark aka ADXRE (pronounced Adore) is an electronic music producer and DJ based in San Francisco, California.

Born and raised in Detroit, the home of Techno, he's been an avid electronic music fan since a young age. Inspired by his music experiences, in 2020 he started ADXRE and began to establish himself by playing DJ sets at major clubs in San Francisco and releasing original tracks.

In 2023 he's been having a breakout year with the release of his track "Laila Nachle" a tech house track sampling a classic Bollywood song. The song has received attention from numerous DJ's and even called "Dance Track of the week" on BBC Asia Radio.

If you're looking to book an artist that will bring a finely tuned high energy set, and draw fans from all over, ADXRE will deliver.
